name: Cardcade
description:
Welcome to the Cardcade,  where we take you back to a better decade! 

This game is a mix between a card game and dungeon crawler. Run through a dungeon, throw cards to activate them and unlock more cards as you progress through the dungeon! Find and restock your deck with NEW unlocked cards that you find in the dungeon to give you an edge over the monsters!

Controls

  • [W] [A] [S] [D] & Arrow keys - Move.
  • Spacebar - Confirm (Menu and inventory)
  • [F] to toggle Fullscreen
  • [I] / [Enter] - inventory
  • Click on and hold down on a card to aim, release to throw it at your cursor location
  • Alternativly press 1,2,3,4,5 or use the mouse scroll wheel to select cards

This game is under development, this is just a small demo of what is to come.
